testcase.name: TC_06 User creates account successfully
testcase.system-out: Given Go to the sign in page................................................passed And Type username and password than click on sign in button.................passed And Click on My Operations dropdown menu....................................passed And Click on Manage Accounts................................................passed And Click on +Create a new Account..........................................passed And Click on Descriptions text box and type some descriptions in the text box.passed And Click on Balance text box and Type a balance in the text box............passed And Select an account type as CHECKING, SAVING,CREDIT_CARD or INVESTING.....passed And Select an account status type from the Account Status Type dropdown and verify.passed And Click on the Create Date textbox and type the time of account creation..passed And Click on the Closed Date textbox and type the time later than the time of account creation.passed And Select an employee from the Employee dropdown and verify................passed Then Click save button......................................................passed
